description: A collection of projects I wanted to put a gold star on.
name: starred

description: Projects you can see and interact with just by clicking the link (no installation or setup required).
name: online

description: Projects that use obscure APIs or run on hardware in the real world.
name: external

description: It’s a game.
name: game

description: It’s pretty.
name: pretty

description: Audio tools, or audible tools, or music.
name: audio

description: These projects require maintenance. I do my best to find maintainers or support projects personally, but sometimes it makes most sense to just let a domain expire.
name: extinct

description: Everything on this page is open source and reusable to some extent. Some projects were built with reuse as a primary goal; that's what this tag represents.
name: reusable

description: Some projects were built with education as a primary goal; that's what this tag represents.
name: instructional

description: A free browser extension, usually available on the Firefox and/or Chrome web stores.
name: browserextension

description: Challenging myself to build systems within constraints, like code golf or only using CSS.
name: golf

description: Not one thing, but many!
name: collection

description: Words that you can read.
name: reading

description: Physical stuff in real life.
name: hardware

description: Things to look at.
name: visual

description: The luddites would approve.
name: untech

description: Posts, features, or announcements about this website (rileyjshaw.com).
name: meta

description: Something that aids in accomplishing a task. I’m using this term loosely to mean anything someone might wanna use without digging into details of how it was made.
name: tool

description: A demo that requires a physical keyboard and/or mouse, or maybe just a big screen.
name: desktop

description: It moves!
name: animated

description: Bright and cheery. You got those crayola books? Oh yaa – technicolor rainbow.
name: colorful

description: Content that you can interact with, beyond just reading, watching, or listening.
name: interactive

description: Uses cellular automata, or a closely related concept.
name: automata

description: …or voxelated.
name: pixelated

description: Uses 3d graphics, or fakes the appearance of something three-dimensional.
name: 3d

description: A hack, bug, exploit, or glitch. Could be intentional, could be emergent, could just be coded before ample coffee.
name: glitch

description: An artwork or process that creates varied results by following simple rules.
name: generative
